sentences.en: A liability for unearned revenue arises when a customer pays in advance.
sentences.cn: 当顾客预先支付款项时,一项负债--预收收入就产生了.

sentences.en: A more - recent study demonstrates that popularity in the music world, even unearned, breeds more popularity.
sentences.cn: 一项近期研究表明,在音乐世界里的流行, 即使非常和努力不相称, 也能引起更大范围的流行.

sentences.en: But land taxes merely reduce the unearned rewards to owners.
sentences.cn: 但土地税只会减少土地所有者不劳而获的收益.

sentences.en: Continue to work with the faith that unearned suffering is redemptive.
sentences.cn: 不该受的苦难可以为自己赎罪,怀着这个信念,继续努力吧!
一切非劳动所得的收入都要申报。

sentences.en: It can be earned or unearned income.
sentences.cn: 这个词可指挣来的收入,也可指并非挣来的收入.

sentences.en: Reduction in the tax on unearned income could be a boost for small businesses.
sentences.cn: 降低非劳动收入税可能会促进小企业的发展。

sentences.en: The abolition of incomes unearned by work.
sentences.cn: 第十一条，取缔不劳而获的收入。

sentences.en: The more unearned income, the higher the tax burden.
sentences.cn: 非勤劳所得越多, 税负越高.

sentences.en: The weight has not swung to the point where there is more unearned wealth than earned wealth and so Americans identify with business and a business ethic, especially compared to attitudes in Europe.
sentences.cn: 现在天平还没有转向不劳而获得到的财富比勤奋工作得到的财富多的情形。 因此与欧洲的观点进行比较的话，美国人用商业和商业道德进行鉴定一个人。

sentences.en: The worst guilt is to accept an unearned guilt.
sentences.cn: 最严重的罪行是接受一个不劳而获的罪行。

sentences.en: Those'shameless " people who choose to live in unearned idleness have a good conscience too.
sentences.cn: 那些乐意过不劳而获的悠闲岁月的 “ 无耻 ” 之徒也心安理得.

words.tran_cn: 不劳而获的；非劳动所得的；不相称的

trans.tran_cn: 不劳而获的，自然得到的，不相称的，不应得的
